file_insights.changes: Replaced empty except:pass block with proper exception handling using warnings module

patterns_discovered.description: Replaced bare exception handler `except (json.JSONDecodeError, IOError): pass` with captured exception and warnings.warn()
patterns_discovered.purpose: Code quality compliance - eliminate silent failures

patterns_discovered.description: Exception is caught, logged, and execution continues with fallback to default template

gotchas_discovered.description: warnings.warn() may not display by default depending on Python runtime filters
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider whether warnings should use logging module for guaranteed visibility in production

gotchas_discovered.description: Catches both JSONDecodeError and IOError but uses generic fallback - different errors may warrant different handling
gotchas_discovered.impact: low - graceful fallback works for both cases

recommendations.recommendation: Review logging strategy across project - consider whether warnings module or logging module is more appropriate

recommendations.recommendation: Validate that warnings are visible at appropriate log levels in production environment
recommendations.rationale: Python warnings can be filtered/suppressed by default in some contexts
